scripts.format: npm run format:check && npm run format:fix
scripts.lint: npm run lint:check && npm run lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run format:check && npm run lint:check
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp -r src/* build && rm build/libraries/*.{map,d.ts}
scripts.build:windows: (if not exist build mkdir build) && xcopy /e /k /i /Y src build && del build\libraries\*.map && del build\libraries\*.d.ts
